sailpoint.object

Interface WorkItemOwnerChangeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCertificationItem, Certification, CertificationEntity, CertificationItem

    public interface WorkItemOwnerChangeListener
    A listener interface that classes can implement to be able to handle work items changing owners. This is not a typical listener or observer pattern in that the listener cannot register interest in the work item. The work item holds weak references (by ID) to the objects that can serve as listeners, so it must explicitly enumerate all possible listeners. If you implement this interface, you will need to modify some code around WorkItem.notifyOwnerChangeListeners() so that your class is notified when a work item owner is changed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void workItemOwnerChanged(Resolver resolver, WorkItem item, Identity newOwner, Identity previousOwner)
      Receive and handle a notification that the owner was changed on the given WorkItem.

    • Method Detail

      • workItemOwnerChanged

        void workItemOwnerChanged(Resolver resolver,
                          WorkItem item,
                          Identity newOwner,
                          Identity previousOwner)
                   throws GeneralException
        Receive and handle a notification that the owner was changed on the given WorkItem.
        Parameters:
        resolver - The Resolver to use.
        item - The WorkItem that had its owner changed.
        newOwner - The new owner of the work item.
        previousOwner - The previous owner of the work item.
        Throws:
        GeneralException
